text: An akar kam nɨ danɨngasa e mɨkeme, ‘Josep, nɨn aveghbuaba arazir bar kuraba nɨ gamua, bar pazavɨra nɨ gami. Ezɨ kɨ nɨn azai, ga uaning, nɨ men arazir kurar kaba, gɨn amadagh.’ Ezɨ e datɨrɨghɨn, en afeziamɨn Godɨn ingangarir gumaziba, e nɨn azai, e uari, nɨ en arazir kurar ekiar kam, a gɨn amadagh.” Ezɨ Josep akar kam baregha azia iti.
